name: Vegan Fried Rice
description: This Vegan Fried Rice is better than take out and ready in 20 minutes! A great way to use up leftover rice and the perfect weeknight dinner when you barely have time to cook. No eggs!
recipeIngredient: 1 block firm or extra-firm tofu (14-16 oz)
4 cups cooked and chilled rice (white or brown are both fine)
3-4 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce (use tamari for gluten free)

itemListElement.text: Drain the block of tofu (no need to press it). In a large pan, heat the olive oil, then mash the block of tofu right in the pan or crumble it in using your fingers. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring frequently for 3-4 minutes until most of the water is gone.
itemListElement.name: Drain the block of tofu (no need to press it). In a large pan, heat the olive oil, then mash the block of tofu right in the pan or crumble it in using your fingers. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring frequently for 3-4 minutes until most of the water is gone.

itemListElement.text: Add the nutritional yeast, salt and turmeric and stir constantly for 3-4 more minutes, then transfer the scrambled tofu to a plate and set aside while you make the rice.
itemListElement.name: Add the nutritional yeast, salt and turmeric and stir constantly for 3-4 more minutes, then transfer the scrambled tofu to a plate and set aside while you make the rice.

itemListElement.text: To the pan, add an additional 2 tablespoons olive oil and warm over medium-high heat. Sauté the onion, garlic, carrots and peas for about 5 minutes, stirring, until the vegetables have softened.
itemListElement.name: To the pan, add an additional 2 tablespoons olive oil and warm over medium-high heat. Sauté the onion, garlic, carrots and peas for about 5 minutes, stirring, until the vegetables have softened.

itemListElement.text: Now add the cooked and chilled rice, green onions and soy sauce. Fry, stirring often, for about 3-4 minutes. Stir in the tofu scramble.
itemListElement.name: Now add the cooked and chilled rice, green onions and soy sauce. Fry, stirring often, for about 3-4 minutes. Stir in the tofu scramble.

itemListElement.text: Remove from heat and stir in the sesame oil. Add more soy sauce to taste, and serve immediately. Enjoy!
itemListElement.name: Remove from heat and stir in the sesame oil. Add more soy sauce to taste, and serve immediately. Enjoy!
